alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 8:20PM CDT until March 27 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Baxterville, or 14 miles east of Columbia, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pine Ridge around 835 PM CDT. Hattiesburg around 845 PM CDT. Oak Grove around 850 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
